channel.title: Hey, I'm Nicky - I help people consistently achieve their most important daily tasks
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm a developer boostrapping an OSX (desktop) app that helps you consistently achieve your most important tasks. It's called ActionAlly.
It did pretty well on Product Hunt here (http://www.producthunt.com/posts/actionally) and Hiten Shah published it in his newsletter after enjoying the experience.
That influx of traffic was great but I'm a little bit stuck at the moment without a clear path for keeping the momentum moving forward.
I'm here to learn and execute. Any thoughts or advice is much appreciated!

item.title: Hey, I'm Nicky - I help people consistently achieve their most important daily tasks
item.dc:creator: nickyhajal
item.description:
Hey guys, I’m a developer boostrapping an OSX (desktop) app that helps you consistently achieve your most important tasks. It’s called ActionAlly.

It did pretty well on Product Hunt here (http://www.producthunt.com/posts/actionally) and Hiten Shah published it in his newsletter after enjoying the experience.

That influx of traffic was great but I’m a little bit stuck at the moment without a clear path for keeping the momentum moving forward.

I’m here to learn and execute. Any thoughts or advice is much appreciated!

Read full topic
